discourse_list.title: Weekly SourceCred distribution, work reaches ATH!

content.content: The weekly SourceCred payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcements  WARNING:  Cred scores and payouts may see volatility in the coming weeks and months as we tweak the algorithm and payout parameters. We still have a lot of work to do before the system is optimized enough to “ossify”, producing predictable payouts. Payouts This week $5,000 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Cred Stats Total Cred created (a proxy for work) continues its weekly uptrend, hitting an All-time-High (ATH) of 4,448 Cred! P    image889×483 49.4 KB  The forum continues to see an uptick in new users, with 5 new opt-ins this week. @prose11 and @Cryptouf continue their climb up the infamously difficult Maker governance learning curve , as shown below in the chart showing the top new Cred earners in the last six weeks (i.e. their first contribution was made during last six weeks).  image946×543 63 KB  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contribution Author     204.8 [Signal Request] Vault Compensation Working Group Payment @monet-supply   204.2 Rates Changes Proposal 7 Dec 2020 @Primoz   171.5 MIP29 - Peg Stability Module (PSM) Risk Assessment @Primoz   161.7 MIP7c3-SP6: Domain Team Onboarding (Smart Contracts Domain Team) @hexonaut   156.3 ETH-B DC-IAM: Initial Parameters @Primoz   137.4 [Signal Request] PSM Parameters @Primoz   122.7 REPLY to: Road to the PSM @hexonaut   121.6 11/25/20 Oracle Outage Post-Mortem @NikKunkel   114.7 REPLY to: [Signal Request] PSM Parameters @g_dip   109.8 New Community Members - What Brought You Here? @g_dip    Top Contributors Below are the top 10 contributors last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contributor     332.5 hexonaut   299.3 Primoz   172.2 LongForWisdom   164.7 monet-supply   146.5 ElProgreso   131 SebVentures   128 prose11   126 mrabino1   115.1 NikKunkel   108.4 g-dip    If you have any questions or concerns about the scores, data or presentation thereof, please don’t hesitate to ask!

s_ben:  The forum continues to see an uptick in new users, with 5 new opt-ins this week. @prose11 and @Cryptouf continue their climb up the infamously difficult Maker governance learning curve , as shown below in the chart showing the top new Cred earners in the last six weeks (i.e. their first contribution was made during last six weeks).   Haha you get it ! I’m even ready for my first topic !
Topics, as you can see, tend to get the more Cred than replies. Best of luck to ya
Good to know ! But it’s not for cred. This is the cherry on the cake !
